snippet: Serena Williams battered Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova 6-4 6-4 at Wimbledon on Tuesday to join sister Venus in the semi-finals and said she was surprised and delighted the pair were still competing at the top of their sport....
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams battered Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova 6-4 6-4 at Wimbledon on Tuesday to join sister Venus in the semi-finals and said she was surprised and delighted the pair were still competing at the top of their sport.

headline.print_headline: Serena Batters Pavlyuchenkova to Join Venus in Semis
headline.main: Serena Batters Pavlyuchenkova to Join Venus in Semis
